short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool helps recruiters find the best canidate for the job

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LinkedIn Chrome Extension is a Google Chrome extension that let's you easily and quickly pull the profile data you need. Set the fields you want and press Scrape - it's really that easy!
